amendment.description: To extend the prohibition on oil and gas drilling in the Great Lakes through fiscal year 2005.

vote.text: Amendment SA 206 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 206 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Voinovich. (consideration: CR S1412-1416; text: CR S1414) To extend the prohibition on oil and gas drilling in the Great Lakes through fiscal year 2005.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 206 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 206 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Voinovich.
